writing.name: DAY1_BEGIN_HALLWAY
writing.text: You are in a new high school which opened this year. It's exciting and you're hoping they'll be easy on the coursework. You feel nervous but you're also happy to meet new people.

writing.name: DAY1_CLASSROOM_01
writing.text: oh well another school year...sigh. I wonder if the food is better here. It should be...

writing.name: DAY1_DESK_PERSON_02_DIALOGUE_04
writing.text: Nice to meet you! Nice new school huh? Do you live nearby?

writing.name: DAY_1_CLASSROOM_PT02_TIME_PASS
writing.text: Time passes by and You hear the school bell ring and everyone goes to have lunch in the cafeteria.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_PT02_TIME_PASS
writing.text: You see Ash and Max looking for seats. They seem to be going to the same table.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_CHOICE_02
writing.text: Grab a quick bite and mind your own business.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: You share a nice meal with your new classmates and learn a bit more about them.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Max has a big sister and Ash has two little brothers and luckily both like Pac Man.

writing.name: DAY_1_CAFETERIA_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: You feel like this will be a good year.
